short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Simple password generator using material design

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Material Design password generator. It has only three simple options, and the generated password is always put in the clipboard. Most times you can just click the extension icon, then paste your password into the form.

Source code available at https://github.com/nealey/chrome-pwgen
